lines.text: The <c=#FF0000>Go Wizard</c> couldn't have held a gun! His hands were full with that candle!
Both hands. Instead of just one hand, the other of which coulda fired a gun.
...you gotta be careful when you're carrying a flame!
Yeah, if you don't want to cause a fire.
Oh, wait- hang on, that sounds familiar somehow.
Really? Doesn't ring any bells to me.
...I don't know why I'm botherin' with this.
